name: Balloonz (itch) (uzpykes)
description: You had a great plan. The best plan! You took an air balloon and started your travel across the country to a distant survivor camp. "Zombies can't fly!", you thought to yourself. However, unfortunate winds have taken you out of your course and now you're floating in a middle of a desert with no food or water. The end is near. So you might as well spend the rest of your time taking out some undead!
